actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide an expanded medical expenses deduction.
short_title: Health Care Tax Equity Act of 1995

summary.text: Health Care Tax Equity Act of 1995 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individuals an additional deduction of up to $1800 ($2400 for joint returns) for medical care not compensated for by insurance or otherwise. Reduces such deduction by the value of employer-provided medical coverage or government-paid medical expenses. Excludes such deduction when computing adjusted gross income.

titles.title: Health Care Tax Equity Act of 1995
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide an expanded medical expenses deduction.
